item.title: Youtube Video Editor for Educational Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Key Responsibilities:

- Edit raw footage into polished, educational videos.
- Create animations and graphics to illustrate concepts
- Incorporate voiceovers, music, and sound effects
- Ensure content adheres to educational standards and channel style

Requirements:

- Proven experience in video editing, preferably for educational content
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects)
- Understanding of YouTube best practices and trends
- Ability to meet deadlines

If you're passionate about education and video production, we'd love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 17:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Animated Video Map of CEO's Travels - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented animator to create an engaging animated video map showcasing our CEO's travel history.

With data for approximately 67 flights, we need the animation to vividly illustrate these journeys in a style similar to this video [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I-HCMbTDWVo].

The final deliverable should include two versions: one with a light theme and one with a dark theme.

If you have experience in animation and can bring our CEO's travels to life, we'd love to hear from you.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 23, 2024 17:53 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:2D Animation, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Illustration, Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Skills: 2D Animation, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Illustration, Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Video Editing

item.title: Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a short-form content video editor for TikTok and Instagram Reels.

Our client is in the automotive industry and has significant amounts of long-form video content that we will want to create short-form video content from.

This client builds custom car headlights and has a great product we want to showcase with high-quality reels.

Experience and knowledge of the automotive industry is preferred.

Proposals without work samples will be disregarded.


Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00

Category: Video Editing

item.title: Social Media Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and creative video editor to create engaging short-form videos for social media platforms.

The ideal candidate should have experience in editing videos that are similar in style to the talking head videos made famous by Hormozi.

You will be responsible for selecting and editing video clips, adding text overlays, and enhancing the visual and audio elements to create captivating videos.

Collaboration with our content team will be essential to ensure the videos align with our brand image and messaging. This is a fantastic opportunity to showcase your video editing skills and contribute to the growth of our social media presence.
  Required Skills:
  - Proficient in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, OpusClip, Captions etc.)
  - Familiarity with creating short-form videos for social media platforms
  - Ability to tell compelling stories through video editing
  - Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
  - Experience in adding text overlays and enhancing visual and audio elements

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 17:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a talented and experienced Video Editor to join our creative team. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, a passion for storytelling, and the technical skills to bring our video projects to life. This role involves editing raw footage, adding sound effects, music, and graphics, and ensuring the final product meets our high standards.

Responsibilities:

Edit raw video footage into polished final products that meet the project’s goals.

Incorporate sound effects, music, voiceovers, and other audio elements to enhance video content.

Add graphics, animations, and special effects to videos.

Collaborate with the creative team to develop video concepts and storyboards.

Ensure all video content aligns with the company’s brand guidelines and messaging.

Manage and organize media assets.

Stay up-to-date with industry trends and techniques to bring fresh ideas to our projects.

Troubleshoot technical issues and provide solutions during the editing process.

Qualifications:

Proven experience as a Video Editor, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.

Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects).

Solid understanding of audio mixing and sound design.

Strong knowledge of graphic design and animation software (e.g., Adobe After Effects, Illustrator).

Excellent storytelling skills and attention to detail.

Ability to work under tight deadlines and handle multiple projects simultaneously.

Strong communication and collaboration skills.



Posted On: June 23, 2024 17:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Concept Video, Demo Video, Corporate Video, Digital Video, Live Action Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, Testimonial Video, Video Commercial
Skills: Concept Video, Demo Video, Corporate Video, Digital Video, Live Action Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, Testimonial Video, Video Commercial
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editor for English user-generated content - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a video editor to edit English user-generated content (UGC) for social media ads.  

See attached ad examples.

About us:
We’re one of the leading UGC agencies in Scandinavia. We help established DTC brands lower their CPA and scale their paid ads across multiple target markets with efficient UGC setups - including native localisations for each country.

See more about us here:
https://nordcreatives.com/

You will be editing English ads IN CAPCUT for brands like:
1) 🇬🇧 Huel - https://huel.com/
2) 🇩🇰 Soundboks - https://soundboks.com/
3) 🇫🇮 Reima - https://reima.com/
4) 🇳🇴 Bbhugme - https://www.bbhugme.com/

Compensation will be based on the amount of videos you produce every month.

P.S.
You need to know about UGC and be a decent editor.

All videos MUST be edited in CapCut (free software and easy to learn if you use other editing software)

Other than that, no experience is needed.

You will be given a task that shows us your skills.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 17:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Short Video Ad, Video Editing, English, UGC
Skills: CapCut, Short Video Ad, Video Editing, English, UGC
Country: Denmark
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor For Daily Vlog - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there!

I’m @thestopdrinkingcoach on Instagram. I’m a leading sobriety and life coach and I am looking to start a daily vlog and I’m looking for A+ super star vlog / video editor to help me create a daily vlog for my social media.

I like this style and theme:

https://www.instagram.com/caleigh.wears?igsh=MXFwMjk5ZWdtemh5OQ==

The colors, overlays, transitions, caption style, etc

I am looking to build a long term relationship with someone who can start with vlog style content and then transition to possibly YouTube content annd editing for my podcast as well.

You would need to have an iPhone, as I would like a very simple, streamlined process where I simply create a shared album and record straight to my iPhone and add all clips to a shared album for you to edit.

To be considered****

Please provide samples of your vlog or video editing work so I can see your capabilities, style, creativity, etc

I am in the USA, central time zone so looking for someone who can communicate during those business hours.

I am looking forward to meeting you!

Hourly Range: $18.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 17:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Vlog
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Vlog
Country: United States
click to apply
